instructions: Cut chicken wings into three sections; discard wing tip sections. In a bowl, combine the soy sauce, marmalade, garlic, ginger and pepper. Cover and refrigerate 1/2 cup marinade for basting.
Place remaining marinade in a large resealable plastic bag. Add wing sections; seal bag and toss to coat evenly. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight.
Drain and discard marinade. Place chicken wings in a greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 15 minutes.
Baste with a third of the reserved marinade; bake 15 minutes longer. Baste with remaining marinade. Bake 10-20 minutes more or until chicken juices run clear.
title: Marmalade Soy Wings
sentences: Cut chicken wings into three sections; discard wing tip sections.
In a bowl, combine the soy sauce, marmalade, garlic, ginger and pepper.
Cover and refrigerate 1/2 cup marinade for basting.
Place remaining marinade in a large resealable plastic bag.
Add wing sections; seal bag and toss to coat evenly.
Place chicken wings in a greased 15-in.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 15 minutes.
Baste with a third of the reserved marinade; bake 15 minutes longer.
Bake 10-20 minutes more or until chicken juices run clear.
